P

Player - Class in com.company
The Player class is consisted of a players data in the game , Which is its color value and list of tokens it has .
Player(int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.company.Player
Makes a new player with the given x and y and also its color value .
PlayingSystem - Class in com.company
This class is the most important class in this game .
PlayingSystem(int, int) - Constructor for class com.company.PlayingSystem
Makes a new game with the given color value for each player .
playTurn() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Has control over the turns of players in the game .
printBoard() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Prints the board (map) of our game .
printData() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Prints all tokens shape which shows their color , and also x and y for each of them .
printMenu() - Method in class com.company.PlayingSystem
Prints the menu for when the game is started .User can choose between multi player game and game between user and computer .
